run_openmm¶

deepdrivemd.sim.openmm_stream.run_openmm.adios_configuration(cfg: deepdrivemd.sim.openmm.config.OpenMMConfig)¶

Read a template adios.xml file, replace SimulationOutput stream name with the simulation directory and write the resulting configuration file into simulation directory.

deepdrivemd.sim.openmm_stream.run_openmm.init_input(cfg)¶

The first iteration of the simulation is initialized from pdb files in cfg.initial_pdb_dir. For the given simulation the pdb file is selected using simulation task_id in a round robin fashion.

deepdrivemd.sim.openmm_stream.run_openmm.next_outlier(cfg: deepdrivemd.sim.openmm.config.OpenMMConfig, sim: simtk.openmm.app.simulation.Simulation)¶

Get the next outlier to use as an initial state.

Parameters

  • cfg (OpenMMConfig) –

  • sim (omm.app.Simulation) –

Returns

path to pdb file with positions, path to numpy file with velocities, rmsd, md5sum

Return type

Tuple[str, str, float, str]

deepdrivemd.sim.openmm_stream.run_openmm.prepare_simulation(cfg: deepdrivemd.sim.openmm.config.OpenMMConfig, iteration: int, sim: simtk.openmm.app.simulation.Simulation)¶

Replace positions and, with cfg.copy_velocities_p probability, velocities of the current simulation state from an outlier

Parameters

  • cfg (OpenMMConfig) –

  • iteration (int) –

  • sim (omm.app.Simulation) –

Returns

True if there is an outlier, False - otherwise

Return type

bool
